masterAbilities.name: Spider Climb
masterAbilities.description: Your mastery of climbing allows you to scale surfaces that would challenge lesser climbers. Automatically succeed on climbing checks with DC 12 or lower, moving at full speed.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your mastery allows you to scale the surface effortlessly.

masterAbilities.name: Cat's Grace
masterAbilities.description: You land with supernatural grace, absorbing impact that would injure others. Take no damage from falls of 30 feet or less.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: You land with cat-like grace, absorbing the impact.

masterAbilities.name: Ghost Walk
masterAbilities.description: You move with preternatural silence, your footsteps barely disturbing the air. Automatically succeed on stealth checks with DC 14 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: You move like a shadow, making no sound.

masterAbilities.name: Death-Defying Leap
masterAbilities.description: Your leaping ability far exceeds normal limits. Add 10 feet to your maximum leap distance.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: You launch yourself through the air with impossible distance.

masterAbilities.name: Perfect Balance
masterAbilities.description: Your sense of balance is impeccable. Automatically succeed on balance checks with DC 16 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your perfect balance keeps you steady.

masterAbilities.name: Polyglot
masterAbilities.description: Your linguistic mastery encompasses all common cants and dialects. Automatically succeed on language and cant checks with DC 14 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: The words come naturally, as if you've spoken this tongue your whole life.

masterAbilities.name: Cultural Diplomat
masterAbilities.description: You understand the subtle protocols of every culture. Automatically succeed on cultural protocol checks with DC 14 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: You navigate the cultural expectations with practiced ease.

masterAbilities.name: Master Negotiator
masterAbilities.description: Your negotiation skills allow you to recover from setbacks. Once per conversation, you may re-roll a failed negotiation check.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: You adjust your approach, finding a new angle.

masterAbilities.name: Silver Tongue
masterAbilities.description: Your words carry an almost magical persuasiveness. Automatically succeed on persuasion checks with DC 12 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your silver tongue works its magic.

masterAbilities.name: Fearsome Reputation
masterAbilities.description: Your reputation precedes you, making your threats all the more effective. Add +2d10 to all intimidation checks.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your fearsome reputation lends weight to your words.

masterAbilities.name: Auto-Bypass
masterAbilities.description: Simple locks and systems pose no challenge to your expertise. Automatically succeed on bypass checks with DC 10 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: The mechanism yields instantly to your expert touch.

masterAbilities.name: Salvage Expertise
masterAbilities.description: Your careful technique always preserves valuable components. You always recover trap components on successful disarmament.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your expert touch preserves the valuable components.

masterAbilities.name: Silent Bypass
masterAbilities.description: You work with absolute silence, never alerting guards or triggering audio sensors. Your successful bypass attempts generate no noise.

masterAbilities.name: Glitch Reader
masterAbilities.description: You've learned to read the patterns in corrupted systems. Reduce the DC penalty from [Glitched] status by 2.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: You read the glitch patterns, finding the rhythm in the chaos.

masterAbilities.name: Wasteland Cartographer
masterAbilities.description: You've mapped so much of the wasteland that finding your way is second nature. Automatically succeed on navigation checks with DC 10 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your mental map guides you unerringly.

masterAbilities.name: Apex Scavenger
masterAbilities.description: You find resources where others see only waste. You never return empty-handed from foraging, and all yields are increased by 50%.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your trained eye spots resources others would miss.

masterAbilities.name: Master Tracker
masterAbilities.description: No trail escapes your notice. You can track trails up to 48 hours old, double the normal limit.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Even the faintest traces reveal a clear path to you.

masterAbilities.name: Hazard Sense
masterAbilities.description: You've developed an almost supernatural awareness of environmental dangers. Automatically succeed on hazard detection checks with DC 16 or lower.
masterAbilities.triggerMessage: Your instincts scream a warning before you even consciously perceive the danger.
